title: Barcelona Roll On
description:
The FC crew react to Barcelona's 4-0 victory over Cadiz and preview Mallorca's visit to Real Madrid in which Eden Hazard is expected to return to the starting lineup. Plus, Gab Marcotti joins the show to recap Saturday's Serie A action and Jan Aage Fjortfot analyzes Bayern's decision to rest player leading to their 3rd straight Bundesliga draw
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Barcelona  scores 4 goals; Bayern held to a 3rd straight Bundesliga draw; RB Leipzig thrash Borussia Dortmund 3-0
